name: Damaged armor
text:
Remove all nanite counters from Iron Man. Take 1 damage for each counter removed this way. If you take damage from this effect → remove Damaged Armor from the game.
If no counters were removed by this effect, take 2 damage and discard this obligation.

name: Crimson Dynamo
text: Toughness. Retaliate 1. [star] Forced Response: After Crimson Dynamo attacks and damages Iron Man, remove 1 nanite counter from him. (Iron Man’s nemesis minion.)

name: Armor Wars
text: The Crimson Dynamo appears to show once and for all that he has the best armor. Hinder 1[per_hero]. While Armor Wars is in play, treat the printed text box of Iron Man as if it were blank (except for [[traits]]).

name: Darkstar
text: When Revealed: Discard 5 cards from the encounter deck. If Vanguard was discarded by this effect, put him into play engaged with you. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and put it into play engaged with you, then shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Vanguard
text: Guard. Toughness. Armored 2. (Reduce the amount of damage this character takes from each attack by 2.) [star] Boost: Put Vanguard into play engaged with you.

name: Shock
text: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to the Iron Man player and remove 1 nanite counter from Iron Man’s identity. [star] Boost: If this activation deals damage to a friendly character, stun that character.
